comments.body:
This is meant to make sure we don't accidentally leave the warning visible when the corresponding version has been published.

Of course we could just remove the annotation instead, this is a safeguard.

diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,25 @@
+package docs
+
+import mdoc.Reporter
+import mdoc.StringModifier
+import scala.meta.inputs.Input
+import scala.meta.internal.metals.BuildInfo
+import scala.meta.internal.semver.SemVer.Version
+
+class VersionedDocsModifier extends StringModifier {
+  val name = "since"
+
+  override def process(
+      version: String,
+      code: Input,
+      reporter: Reporter
+  ): String = {
+    val unreleased =
+      Version.fromString(version) >= Version.fromString(BuildInfo.metalsVersion)
+
+    if (unreleased) {
+      s"> ğŸš§ This documentation section describes a feature that is currently unreleased. The expected release version is $version\n"
+    } else ""
